1 tablespoon kosher salt,1 teaspoon smoked paprika,1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper,1/2 teaspoon onion powder,1/2 teaspoon garlic powder,2 tablespoons mustard,1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar,2 tablespoons cherry cola,1 (3 pound) rack baby back ribs, membrane removed,1 1/2 cups cherry cola,2 tablespoons ketchup,1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper,salt to taste,,
